verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G189>fame<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3816>servants,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G910>Baptist;<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> do show <S%G1754>forth<s%> themselves <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had laid hold <S%G2902>on<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> him <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> for Herodias' <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G2266><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G2309>would<s%> have put him to <S%G615>death,<s%> <S%G846><s%> he <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2192>counted<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> <S%G1077>birthday<s%> was <S%G71>kept,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G3738>danced<s%> before <S%G1722>them,<s%> <S%G3319><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G2264>Herod.<s%>
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> he <S%G3670>promised<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G3727>oath<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> she would <S%G154>ask.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>she,<s%> being before <S%G4264>instructed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1325>Give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G910>Baptist's<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>charger.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3076>sorry:<s%> <S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> for the oath's <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3727><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them which sat with him at <S%G4873>meat,<s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> it to be <S%G1325>given<s%> her.
And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3992>sent,<s%> and <S%G607>beheaded<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> was <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>charger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2877>damsel:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G5342>brought<s%> it to <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and took <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2290>buried<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, he <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2596>apart:<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> thereof, they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on <S%G3979>foot<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G732>sick.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3798>evening,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> This <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5610>time<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G3928>past;<s%> send the multitude <S%G630>away,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3793><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1033>victuals.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> They need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G565>depart;<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5528>grass,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fishes,<s%> and looking <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G2127>blessed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2806>broke,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G5526>filled:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they took <S%G142>up<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2801>fragments<s%> that <S%G4052>remained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they that had <S%G2068>eaten<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> five <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5565>beside<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3813>children.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G315>constrained<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1684>get<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to go <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> other <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he sent the multitudes <S%G630>away.<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had sent the multitudes <S%G630>away,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3793><s%> he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2596>apart<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to <S%G4336>pray:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> when the <S%G3798>evening<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G928>tossed<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G2949>waves:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1727>contrary.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> in the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they were <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5326>spirit;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Be of good <S%G2293>cheer;<s%> it <S%G1510>is<s%> <S%G1473>I;<s%> be not afraid. <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3361><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G1488>be<s%> <S%G4771>thou,<s%> <S%G2753>bid<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5204>water.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Come. <S%G2064>And<s%> <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was come <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship,<s%> he <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%> to <S%G2064>go<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G991>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2478>boisterous,<s%> he was <S%G5399>afraid;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> to <S%G2670>sink,<s%> he <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stretched <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1949>caught<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> O thou of little <S%G3640>faith,<s%> wherefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> didst thou doubt? <S%G1365><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G1684>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>ceased.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they were gone <S%G1276>over,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> had <S%G1921>knowledge<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> they sent <S%G649>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> country round <S%G4066>about,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2192>diseased;<s%> <S%G2560><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2899>hem<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> were made perfectly <S%G1295>whole.<s%>
